sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import formatDistance from 'date-fns/formatDistance' import ruLocale from 'date-fns/locale/ru' import './Message.scss' const Message = ({ avatar, user, text, date, isMine }) => { const beatyDate = formatDistance(date, new Date(), { addSuffix: true, locale: ruLocale, }) return (

{text}

{beatyDate}
) } Message.propTypes = { avatar: PropTypes.string, user: PropTypes.object, text: PropTypes.string, date: PropTypes.number, isMine: PropTypes.bool, } Message.defaultProps = { user: {}, } export default Message
